head.supplied: 4/7/78. ¶ ¶ It will be needful, dear Mr Odgers, that Mr Ferres receives a memorandum (so he says) to instruct him to print the book on the Victorian plants. ¶ Regardfully ¶ ¶ Ferd. von Mueller....

div.p: O78/5295, unit 1022, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

It will be needful, dear Mr Odgers, that Mr Ferres receives a memorandum (so he says) to instruct him to print the book on the Victorian plants.
B79.06.04. See M to G. Berry, 23 May 1878, in which M requests that his 'plain popular work on Victorian plants' be printed at the Government Printer's Office, or else that funds be allocated to cover the cost of having it printed by a private firm.
